description: Detects the creation of taskmgr.exe process in context of LOCAL_SYSTEM Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Taskmgr as LOCAL_SYSTEM
query: (user.name:(NT\ AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM* OR AUTORITE\ NT\\Sys*) AND process.executable:*\\taskmgr.exe)
